name: Retro Rocket
description: Retro Rocket is an oscilloscope-themed robot and a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design and retro console buttons, it brings a nostalgic charm to the digital world. Equipped with rocket-powered arms and legs, Retro Rocket is always ready for high-speed adventures. Its classic screen displays intricate waveforms and data with unparalleled clarity, making it an indispensable tool for analyzing electrical signals. Whether it's exploring new circuits or aiding in complex engineering tasks, Retro Rocket's versatility and vintage aesthetic make it a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
